Create a SNAPverse diagram

Save a SNAPverse diagram to disk. The default verse is "complete". It is the only option at this time. More coming soon. Other arguments are passed to DiagrammeR::export_graph.

verse_diagram(verse = "complete", file_name = "sv_td_all.svg",
  file_type = NULL, title = NULL, width = 350, height = NULL)

Arguments

verse

character, type of verse flowchart diagram. Defaults to "complete".
file_name

output file name, defaults to "sv_td_all.svg" for a topdown chart of the full verse.
file_type

the output file type.
title

character, flowchart title.
width

numeric.
height

numeric.

Value

side effect of saving image file to disk.

Examples

# NOT RUN {
verse_diagram(title="Simplified overview of the SNAPverse")
# }

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Examples
